alert.note: Alert for Grand Canyon Country; Northern Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 15 at 2:59AM MST until February 15 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow showers continue early this morning. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Areas above 4000 feet near Grand Canyon, North Rim, Payson and Pine-Strawberry. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MST early this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery and snow-packed road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Additional snow forecast from 2 AM Today to 6 AM Today: Grand Canyon 0 to 1 inches North Rim 0 to 1 inches Payson 0 to 1 inches Pine-Strawberry 0 to 1 inches .
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Grand Canyon Country; Northern Gila County
